newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russia sets interest on OFZ bond.
newsitem.headline: Russia sets interest on OFZ bond.

text.p: The quarterly coupon paid on December 11 on the two-year OFZ bond maturing March 1998 (series number 24007) will be 149,788 roubles, equivalent to an annual rate of 60.08 percent, the central bank said on Wednesday.
The coupon being paid on September 11 is 410,273 roubles or 164.56 percent.
Quarterly interest on OFZ bonds is calculated on the basis of yields of GKO discount Treasury bills maturing within 30 days of the payment of interest.
